mcq.statement: Select the sentence with the correct use of a collective noun: A swarm of bees attacked the farmer., A shoal of lions chased the prey., A herd of books was on the shelf., A band of flowers were given to her.

options.a: A swarm of bees attacked the farmer.
options.b: A shoal of lions chased the prey.
options.c: A herd of books was on the shelf.
